author: cmpilato
msg: Don't allow 'svn cl --cl old-changelist new-changelist' to spam the
screen with "Skipped" notifications for directories that (by virtue of
being directories) aren't part of the old changelist.

author: jensseidel
msg: Use workaround for an xgettext limitation.
xgettext fails to look up macros in some messages so that these are not put
into PO files and that's why untranslated. This patch explicitly adds
duplicates of these strings with manually expanded macros.

author: epg
msg: Change vote to -0 for r31313 until test failures are fixed.

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r31075, fix a bug in initial fix for issue #3157 'Merging a
change from a path's natural history creates self-referential mergeinfo'.
(determine_merges_performed): Change signature to take a rangelist rather
that the start of the requested merge range is >= the youngest
implicit mergeinfo range, that is not always the case.
using rangelists instead of single ranges.
